content: the vanier v-neck tunic is a lacy oversized tunic with a plunging v-neck add length to make a beach cover-up or use a heavier yarn to create a cold-weather top this pattern uses simple stitches and its construction is quite easy making it suitable for advanced-beginners the pattern provides written instructions a reduced symbol chart of the pattern stitch and assembly schematics tips are provided on adding / subtracting length adding / subtracting width making a less dramatic neckline adding side vents and adding optional sleeves not pictured
